description:
* Remake of the classic gag comic with the same name by http://anidb.net/cr977 [Akatsuka Fujio].
The leading character is a boy named http://anidb.net/ch37177 [Osomatsu], who is one of sextuplets. This zany comedy features such eccentric and over-the-top characters as bucktoothed French-styled Iymi, bald boy http://anidb.net/ch37183 [Chibita], big-pants http://anidb.net/ch37184 [Dekapan], self-absorbed cutie http://anidb.net/ch37192 [Totoko], and many others. Together they create many topsy-turvy confusions in the town.

REGULAR.description:
Failing salesman Iyami tries robbing Osomatsu`s house, but is foiled by the rambunctious sextuplets.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sheee! The Sextuplets-zansu!
¡Shiee! Los sextillizos
シェーッ! 六つ子ザンス!

REGULAR.description:
A fortune-teller tells Iyami that three terrible things are going to happen to him that day.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I`ve Had It with Fortune-telling-zansu!
うらないは, こりごりザンス

REGULAR.description:
Iyami, a quack doctor in a small town, schemes to discredit his more successful rival.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Genius Iyami`s Transformation Potion-zansu!
天才イヤミの 化け薬ザンス!

REGULAR.description:
Iyami`s ballet school is putting on a performance in three days, but amid backstage turmoil, the prima ballerina keeps changing.Chibita falls in love with Dekapan`s "daughter," Hanako, unaware that she`s actually a pig.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sheee! I`m a Ballerina!
シェ~ッ!! ミーはバレリーナ

REGULAR.description:
Chibita falls in love with Dekapan`s "daughter," Hanako, unaware that she`s actually a pig.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chibita`s Love Falls with the Flowers
チビ太の恋は ハナと散るダス

REGULAR.description:
Iyami fakes his own death in order to collect consolation money.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Profiting from Death Prayers-zansu!
ナンマイダで もうけるザンス

REGULAR.description:
Chibita secretly takes care of an abandoned baby.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chibita Becomes a Mama!
チビ太は ママになりました

REGULAR.description:
Chibita gets a hat that turns him into a good boy when he wears it.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Transformation! Chibita`s Amazing Hat!
変身! チビ太の ふしぎな帽子

REGULAR.description:
Iyami and Chibita are deceptive secondhand item dealers who are aiming for one big score.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Making Easy Money with a Secondhand Store-zansu!
古道具屋で ボロもうけザンス

REGULAR.description:
A Shinigami enlists Iyami`s help to hasten the death of a sickly Osomatsu.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shinigami Salesman From Hell!
地獄の 死神セールスマン!!

REGULAR.description:
Iyami and Chibita are handcuffed together and on the run from the law after breaking out of jail.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Even Behind Bars, Iyami Never Learns!
ヘイの中でも こりないイヤミ

REGULAR.description:
Iyami is a failed novelist who becomes popular when he starts writing outrageous lies about his neighbors.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Great Iyami-sensei, the Popular Author!
売れっ子小説家 イヤミ大先生

REGULAR.description:
When an Edo-era castle suddenly comes to town, the local citizens rebel against their would-be ruler, Chibita.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Castle Moved In Next Door!
お城が隣に 引っ越してきた!

REGULAR.description:
Aliens intent on invading Earth kidnap Osomatsu and Choromatsu, then replace them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Beat the Aliens!
エイリアンを やっつけろ!

REGULAR.description:
After Iyami saves Osomatsu`s life, he demands constant, eternal gratitude.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Getting Your Life Saved is Expensive-zansu!
命の恩は 高くつくザンス

REGULAR.description:
Chibita uses a secret formula to shrink Osomatsu and his brothers as payback for mocking him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Saving? Energy Conservation? Mini-sextuplets!
節約? 省エネ? ミニ六つ子!

REGULAR.description:
Hatabou must summon courage to stand up for himself after being jailed for one of Iyami`s misdeeds.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hatabou Musters Up Courage.
ハタ坊, 勇気を出す

REGULAR.description:
Chibita is a former safecracker who`s trying to go straight, but a detective, Iyami, keeps hounding him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chibita the Safecracker!
チビ太の 金庫やぶり

REGULAR.description:
Dr. Dekapan invents a liquid that causes people to switch psyches when they bump heads.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Switched Psyches!
オツムの中味が 入れかわる

REGULAR.description:
Iyami and Chibita build a watermelon bomb to get revenge against Osomatsu and his brothers.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Iyami, The Dangerous Watch Dealer!
イヤミの アブナイ時計屋さん

REGULAR.description:
Kindhearted newspaper delivery boy Chibita takes in a thieving cat and tries to rehabilitate it.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Friendship! Chibita and the Cat Thief!
友情!! チビ太とドロボウ猫

REGULAR.description:
A mysterious gunslinger, Chibita, shows up at the Dekapan Ranch just in time to drive off six bullying brothers.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chibita is a Wandering Gunslinger
チビ太は さすらいのガンマン

REGULAR.description:
When Osomatsu and the gang are invited for dinner at Iyami`s posh mansion, a mystery ensues.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Great Detective! Hatabou-da jou!
名探偵! ハタ坊だジョー

REGULAR.description:
Totoko becomes infected with personality-altering bacteria from Iyami`s body.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Iyami`s Body is Full of Germs!
イヤミの体は バイキンだらけ

REGULAR.description:
Chibita is framed for stealing oden.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Curse of Oden is Scary-zansu!
おでんの恨みは 怖いザンス!

REGULAR.description:
Dad struggles with quitting smoking after he nearly starts a fire in the house.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dad Can Quit Smoking.
父さんも タバコがやめられる

REGULAR.description:
On Outie Island, Dekapan and Hatabou work hard to make offerings to a stone god, while Iyami and everyone else enjoys the good life.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Fairy Tale of Outie Island!
おとぎ話の デベソ島

REGULAR.description:
When the sextuplets and Totoko go camping, they encounter Iyami, a wild man of the forest.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Watch Out for Wild Iyami!
野生のイヤミに 気をつけろ!

REGULAR.description:
Iyami starts an insurance company, thinking he`ll take people`s money and run.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: It`s Do or Die for an Insurance Agent!
保険屋さんは 命がけザンス!

REGULAR.description:
Chibita comes back to town seeking vengeance after training in the mountains to be a ninja.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ninja Chibita is Here!
忍者チビ太, ただいま参上!

REGULAR.description:
The honest, hardworking Chibita is constantly targeted by the lazy thief, Iyami, but one day he finds a magical rose that changes his life.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Up to Here with the Spirit of the Flower-zansu!
花の精には こりごりザンス!

REGULAR.description:
When a pretty girl moves next door to Osomatsu and his brothers, Totoko is deposed as the neighborhood`s number one idol.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Totoko is the Number One Idol-zansu!
トト子は アイドルNo.1ザンス

REGULAR.description:
Iyami and Chibita are best friends and trapeze artists at a third-rate circus, but Totoko, the ringmaster`s daughter, comes between them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Male Friendship is Hot-zansu!
男の友情は あついザンス!

REGULAR.description:
Exhausted and feeling unloved by his six sons, Dad runs away from home and pledges to raise fellow runaway Chibita.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dad is Dad!
父さんは, 父さんなんだぞ!

REGULAR.description:
In the Edo era, Minister Iyami secretly plots to have Princess Totoko assassinated so his own son, Hatabou, can take the reins of power.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Tomboy Princess of Dekapan Castle!
デカパン城の オテンバ姫!

REGULAR.description:
Oden Chibita X fights for love, justice and truth, but then Buck Teeth Man gets in on the act and steals his thunder.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: It`s Tough Being a Champion of Justice-zansu!
正義の味方は つらいザンス

REGULAR.description:
Chibita sets off for adventure with his grandfather`s treasure map in hand, but is soon captured by pirates.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chibita`s Treasure Island.
チビ太の宝島

REGULAR.description:
Iyami and Chibita pose as a poor elderly couple in order to sponge off of Osomatsu`s family.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Be Kind to the Elderly-zansu!
お年寄りを いたわるザンス!

REGULAR.description:
After feudal lord Hatabou is forced into committing seppuku, his loyal retainers, led by Chibita, plot revenge against the power-hungry Iyami.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Take Caution During a Raid-zansu!
討ち入りには, ご用心ザンス

REGULAR.description:
Osomatsu and his brothers are forced to babysit their dad`s boss`s violent, insomniac son.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Babysitting is Hard Work-zansu!"
子守りは つらい仕事ザンス

REGULAR.description:
Chibita is a bellboy working at the Dayon Hotel when he takes in Totoko, a poor girl who`s lost her beautiful singing voice.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: White Christmas of the Skyline.
摩天楼の ホワイトクリスマス

REGULAR.description:
Chibita becomes apprentice to Iyami, a small-time con man, but their plans go awry when they swindle, Dayon, an off-duty police officer.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Iyami`s Shifty Business!
イヤミの インチキ商売ザンス

REGULAR.description:
The usual gang competes in a wacky car race to sweep the wealthy Totoko off her feet.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Win the Race by Cheating-zansu!
レースは ズルして勝つザンス

REGULAR.description:
French director Iyami and his cameraman Chibita travel to Japan to film a documentary on the "real Japan."
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Iyami`s Gibberish Japan-zansu!
イヤミの デタラメ日本ザンス

REGULAR.description:
Pretending to be a ski instructor, Iyami goes to a resort with Osomatsu and his brothers, but runs afoul of Chibita, a former co-worker with a grudge.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ski Trips Are Tough-zansu!"
スキー旅行は チビチイザンス

REGULAR.description:
Detective Chibita is transferred to a town where oden is prohibited, but is sold in a black market controlled by a shady character.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Hot-blooded Detective Chibita-zansu!
ねっけつ! チビ太刑事ザンス

REGULAR.description:
Iyami is stunned to find he`s won a lottery jacpot on a ticket he made his pal Chibita purchase a year earlier, but only has one day left to collect.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Wealthy from the Lottery-zansu!
宝くじで 大金持ちザンス!

REGULAR.description:
Osomatsu and his brothers are sent to a zen temple to be straightened out by Iyami, a monk who`s in it for the money.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Boys Learn Manners at a Zen Temple!
ゼン寺修行で 六つ子もよい子

REGULAR.description:
Iyami is a crooked police officer who plays pachinko, steals fruit and tries to pick up women while he`s on duty.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Arrogant Police Officer-zansu!
お巡りさんで いばるザンス!

REGULAR.description:
In the primitive age, Chibita is a cook at Iyami`s dinosaur egg omelet restaurant when he finds a baby T-rex that he wants to keep as a pet.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dinosaur Egg Omelet-zansu!"
恐竜たまごの オムレツザンス!

REGULAR.description:
Osomatsu and his family stay at a cheap inn while on vacation, but realize too late that it`s actually an extrememly expensive place way beyond their budget.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: What Happens at the Inn Stays at the Inn-zansu!
旅のハジは かきすてザンス!

REGULAR.description:
Dr. Hatabou creates an explosive lie detector belt for inveterate liar Iyami, which painfully straightens out the con artist, but that causes even more chaos.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: An Honest Iyami is Dangerous!
正しいイヤミは めいわくダス

REGULAR.description:
When Iyami and the sextuplets` father are both up for an important promotion, the president has his son, Chibita, decide who it`ll be after playing golf with Iyami and Osomatsu.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Brown-nosing with Golf-zansu!
ゴマすりゴルフで 出世ザンス

REGULAR.description:
Poverty-stricken Iyami falls for a beautiful, wealthy young woman who feels the same way about him, except she has no idea just how poor he is.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Iyami-san`s Wedding!
イヤミさんの 結婚式だジョー

REGULAR.description:
Dad and the boys have major troubles when they encounter Iyami while on the road in their "new" decrepit used car.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Luck Ran Out on the Drive.
ドライブしたのが ウンのつき

REGULAR.description:
Iyami has a hard time trying to change all the restaurants in town to oden joints in order to please the mega-rich Chibita.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Super-rich Chibita-sama-zansu!
大富豪 チビ太さまザンス!

REGULAR.description:
Iyami pilots a rickety plane to Hawaii, but it gets hijacked en route.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: That Bastard Pilot, Iyami-zansu!
イヤミの ヒコーキ野郎ザンス

REGULAR.description:
Osomatsu is adopted by the wealthy Dekapan and his wife, but finds them to be overprotective, to say the least.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sheee! A 50,000 Yen a Day Allowance!
シェ~! こずかい毎日五万円

REGULAR.description:
Presidential candidate Iyami hires hitman Jou Hatabou to take out his rival, Dayon.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hatabou is a Champion of Justice-dajou!
ハタ坊は 正義の味方だジョー

REGULAR.description:
Chibita and Iyami take revenge against the bullying Osomatsu and his brothers via remote-controlled model airplanes.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Revenge of Flying Chibita-zansu!
空とぶチビ太の 仕返しザンス

REGULAR.description:
Chibita is smitten with Jajako, Hatabou`s cousin, but she hates his favorite thing in the world, oden.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Which is More Important, Oden or Your First Love?
おでんと初恋 どちらがだいじ

REGULAR.description:
When Dad loses his bonus, suspicion quickly falls on Iyami, who`s actually turned over a new leaf.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Where Did Papa`s Bonus Go?
パパのボーナス どこいった?

REGULAR.description:
Osomatsu unwittingly makes a duplicate of himself in Dr. Iyami`s three-dimensional copy machine.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sextuplets Squared!
ゾロゾロ 六つ子が一ダース!

REGULAR.description:
The powerful, rambunctious Chibita Songoku is imprisoned under a rock for 500 years before being rescued by an ambitious monk, Iyami.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Munchkin Monkey Chibita`s Big Adventure!
ちびざるチビ太の 大冒険!

REGULAR.description:
Iyami seeks to steal Totoko Buddha`s sutras so he can kickstart his own religion, but they`re alread held as collateral by moneylender and Chibita`s former master, Hatabou.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Totoko, the Selfish Buddha!
トト子の わがままオシャカ様

REGULAR.description:
Nasty teacher Iyami is tormented by Chibita, the one student who dotes on him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Iyami the Teacher`s Throbbing Story!
イヤミの 教師ビンビン物語!?

REGULAR.description:
Stifled by his royal burdens and constant handlers, Prince Chibiru slips the leash and finds action in a local department store as he gives chase to a pickpocket, Iyami.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Life is Tough for Prince Chibita!
チビ太の 王子様はつらいよ

REGULAR.description:
Dad and the boys think they`re getting a good deal by hanging out at Iyami`s Beach House, but the owner and his assistant, Chibita, gouge their guests for everything they`re worth.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Iyami`s Fishy Beach House!
イヤミの インチキ海の家!

REGULAR.description:
Mom and Dad get to start their lives over again thanks to a magic wish that reverts them to teenagers.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Using Magic to Become Younger-zansu.
魔法を使って 若がえるザンス

REGULAR.description:
Oden stand owner Chibita trains to fight the Akatsukadai boxing champion, Iyami.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Boxing Hurts-zansu!
ボクシングって 痛いザンス!

REGULAR.description:
It`s a war between the parents when Dad becomes frustrated that Mom is a better salesperson than he is.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mom`s a Born Saleswoman?!
母さんは 天才セールスマン!?

REGULAR.description:
Honeybee Chibita is in search of his long-lost mother, but his quest is impeded by a trickster, Iyami Katydid, and the ravenous Dayon Spider.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Honeybee Chibita`s Violin.
みつばちチビ太の バイオリン

REGULAR.description:
Ridde Temple Master Dekapan gives monks Iyami and Chibita the challenge of stumping locals with riddles.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Totoko, the Riddling Genius!
トトコは 天才なぞなぞ少女!

REGULAR.description:
Inspector Chibita teams up with "great detective" Iyami to capture Phantom Thief Dayon.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Detective Iyami versus Phantom Thief Dayon!
探偵イヤミ対 怪人ダヨン面相

REGULAR.description:
30 years later, Osomatsu and his brothers are middle-aged salarymen scientists slaving away under their boss, Dekapan, and his demanding daughter, Totoko.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Iyami, 40 Years Later-zansu!
四十年後の イヤミザンス!

REGULAR.description:
Iyami is driven mad by the desperate measures he takes to sell lousy camera film for his failing company.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Deformed in Front of the Camera-zansu!
カメラの前で べろ~んザンス

REGULAR.description:
Dekapan invents an artificially intelligent vaccum cleaner that goes out of control and threatens to destroy the country.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cleany-kun, the Cleaning Robot!
おそうじロボの ソージ君ダス

REGULAR.description:
God (Dekapan) grants Chibita the power to make all of his wishes come true.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: God, Make My Wish Come True!
神さまお願い きいてチョ

REGULAR.description:
Chibita`s mother comes back into his life by having him kidnapped away from Dekapan, the poor man who raised him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Mother in Chibita`s Imagination.
チビ太の まぶたの母ザンス

REGULAR.description:
With winter on its way, Iyami wants to be jailed for the sake of shelter and warm meals, but all of his attempted crimes turn into good deeds.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Iyami`s Hibernation Strategy-zansu.
イヤミの 冬ごもり作戦ザンス

REGULAR.description:
Would-be burglar Iyami is drafted into posing as the director of a hospital, a ruse that works until he`s forced to treat a yakuza boss.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Raking It In As a Quack!
ニセ医者で ぼろもうけザンス

REGULAR.description:
Iyami is haunted in his dreams by the spirit of a vengeful samurai, Chibita.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Don`t Want Nightmares-zansu!
怖い夢は 見たくないザンス!

REGULAR.description:
When Iyami`s circus goes out of business, he gives the lion to the Matsuno family, which doesn`t sit well with Chibita, the lion`s only friend.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Lions Are Scary When Angry-zansu!
怒ると怖い ライオンザンス!

REGULAR.description:
In ancient Japan, secret retired vice-shogun Hatabou and his companions go up against crooked magistrate Iyami.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hatabou in Mito Koumon!
ハタ坊の 水戸黄門だジョー

REGULAR.description:
To prepare for invading Earth, aliens abduct Iyami and sift through memories of his worst moments.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Aliens Have Come Again!
また来たザンスよ エイリアン

REGULAR.description:
In the final episode, when everyone wants to beat up Iyami and Chibita, it seems their only escape is a long swim across the Pacific.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Iyami`s Surefire Election Strategy-zansu!
イヤミの 選挙必勝法ザンス
Appare! Chibita no Onitaiji zansu
Special
あっぱれチビ太の鬼たいじザンス
Opening
Ending
Osomatsu-kun (1988)
Cosas de locos!!
Cousas de Tolos
おそ松くん (1988)
Cosas de locos!! ¡Esto es lo que hay!
おそ松くん(新)
